flawed_nl_solution:
Ryan read an average of 3000 pages a day because 2100 / 7 = <<2100/7=3000>>3000
He read 2800 more pages a day on average than his brother because 3000 - 200 = <<3000-200=2800>>2800
#### 2800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
